movies.title: Petite fièvre des vingt ans
movies.plot: The story of two young hustlers, Tatsuro and Shin, and her two female friends. Everything seems to work, until the day Shin declares he's in love with Tatsuro.
movies.simplePlot: The story of two young hustlers, Tatsuro and Shin, and her two female friends. Everything seems to work, until the day Shin declares he's in love with Tatsuro.

biography.bio: Yoshihiko Hakamada was born on July 16, 1973 in Shizuoka, Japan. He is an actor, known for Le royaume des chats (2002), Petite fièvre des vingt ans (1993) and Another (2012).
biography.name: Yoshihiko Hakamada

biography.bio: Reiko Kataoka was born on December 20, 1971 in Ehime, Japan. She is an actress, known for Battle Royale (2000), Hush! (2001) and Ai no shinsekai (1994).
biography.name: Reiko Kataoka

biography.bio: Masashi Endô was born on April 2, 1974 in Hokkaido, Japan. He is an actor, known for Wild Zero (1999), Ooru naito rongu: Sanji (1995) and Petite fièvre des vingt ans (1993).
biography.name: Masashi Endô

biography.bio: Sumiyo Yamada is an actress, known for Petite fièvre des vingt ans (1993), Sûpâ no onna (1996) and The Cherry Orchard (1990).
biography.name: Sumiyo Yamada

biography.bio: Kôji Satô is an actor, known for Petite fièvre des vingt ans (1993), The Mamiya Brothers (2006) and Nobody to Watch Over Me (2008).
biography.name: Kôji Satô

biography.bio: Bunmei Harada was born on October 3, 1959 in Ibaraki, Japan. He is an actor, known for Petite fièvre des vingt ans (1993), Yonimo kimyô na monogatari: Aki no tokubetsu hen (2009) and Rookies (2008).
biography.name: Bunmei Harada

biography.bio: Kôta Kusano was born on February 26, 1977 in Japan. He is an actor, known for Moonlight Whispers (1999), Like Grains of Sand (1995) and Tomie (1999).
biography.name: Kôta Kusano

biography.bio: Yôichi Kawaguchi is an actor, known for Petite fièvre des vingt ans (1993) and Les 47 rônins (1994).
biography.name: Yôichi Kawaguchi

biography.bio: Hiroshi Ohkôchi is an actor, known for Hula Girls (2006), Tales of a Golden Geisha (1990) and Tel père, tel fils (2013).
biography.name: Hiroshi Ohkôchi

biography.bio: Tarô Ishida was born on March 16, 1944 in Kyoto, Japan as Gentarô Ishida. He was an actor, known for Metropolis (2001), Departures (2008) and Akira (1988). He died on September 21, 2013 in Sagamihara, Kanagawa, Japan.
biography.name: Tarô Ishida

biography.bio: Wakaba Irie was born on May 12, 1943 in Shiba, Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for I Are You, You Am Me (1982), The Little Girl Who Conquered Time (1983) and Chizuko's Younger Sister (1991).
biography.name: Wakaba Irie

titlesAwards.titleAwardOutcome: Won Sponichi Grand Prize New Talent Award
